The phone when came in was nice to have. I bought it in may when it was just released. But the bugs have got me so off putten that I am planning to switch to an iPhone.The raw mode would never turn on, randomly drop, front camera will automatically magnify pictures and the settings won't turn off(checked all settings) , their inhouse apps like quickbar doesn't work. The entire experience is traumatic.When you raise request in their members app, they send generic responses and never revert back.The phone when came in was nice to have. I bought it in may when it was just released. But the bugs have got me so off putten that I am planning to switch to an iPhone.The raw mode would never turn on, randomly drop, front camera will automatically magnify pictures and the settings won't turn off(checked all settings) , their inhouse apps like quickbar doesn't work. The entire experience is traumatic.When you raise request in their members app, they send generic responses and never revert back.
